Ratatoskr will help you to populate posts with tags. 🏷

To start interaction - send here photo, video or animation. Then simply choose tags you want to choose.
Ratatoskr will store statistics📊 related to tags and their usage.

To update tags list - forward pinned message with tags. Please make sure that tag list has following notation:
Tags

• Tag group:
#tag
#tag
#tag

• Another tag group:

#tag
